name: No Way Back (ShadowLT)
description:
No Way Back is a 2D roguelike shooter that I made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

You play as a gambler who lost everything to a single coin flip. With only a gun (which has terrible accuracy), you enter a desert in hopes of finding a mythical treasure. However, you end up in a cursed, seemingly-endless land filled with unpredictable monsters. Can you break the curse and escape?

Use WASD to move and SPACE to shoot.

The game was made in less than 24 hours. I hope you enjoy it! :)

Since this is a jam submission, expect bad art and some bugs :)

Music by HoliznaCC0 - "Red Skies", "Sunny Afternoon", "Dance Till You Die"
